main_definition: Significant or worthy of attention due to its influence, value, relevance, or impact.

meanings_and_examples.example: Being on time is very important for meeting deadlines.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relevant to the current situation or context
meanings_and_examples.example: Understanding the cultural background is important when working with international teams.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Having a significant effect on something; influential
meanings_and_examples.example: The new policy will have an important impact on our company's operations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Deserving attention or priority due to its implications
meanings_and_examples.example: Proper nutrition is important for maintaining good health.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Being of critical concern or essence
meanings_and_examples.example: Climate change has become an important issue in recent years.
